author: mbk
msg: Fix issue 1465, which was occasional crashes of svnserve on pre-commit hook
failure.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/editor.c
(ra_svn_handle_close_edit): Do not set ds->aborted to FALSE until the
close_edit has actually succeeded, since failures in hooks can cause
problems.
* subversion/svnserve/serve.c
(commit): Initialize aborted to TRUE, so that abnormal termination of the
commit editor cannot leave it in an unknown state.

author: mbk
msg: Fix issue 1470, which is that if either apr_uid_current() or apr_uid_name_get()
fail, svn returns a fatal error.  This prevented svn from working on Win98
against a password-protected repository (without sneaky workarounds).
Note: I have not actually tested this on Win98, but this change works when
I simulate failure of apr_uid_current() on my test machine.
* subversion/libsvn_client/auth.c
(get_creds):  Gracefully handle errors from apr_uid_current/apr_uid_name_get.

author: mbk
msg: Cleanup of long lines generated by the search-and-replace in revision 6671.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/merge.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/log.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/props.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/util.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/merge.c
Wrap lines longer than 80 chars.

author: josander
msg: Added functionality for detecting and handling shfolder.dll if this file is not
detected during the installation.
* packages\win32-innosetup\isx_main.pas:
-Code cleanups.
-(VCRuntimeDownLoadInfo): Removed. The procedure SysFilesDownLoadInfo
are in use instead for missing shfolder.dll and C run time files.
-(InitializeSetup): Are now looking for shfolder.dll too.
-(NextButtonClick): Are calling SysFilesDownLoadInfo and not
VCRuntimeDownLoadInfo if system files are missing.
* packages\win32-innosetup\missing_shfolderdll.html:
Contains info and links for downloading and installing shfolder.dll.
* packages\win32-innosetup\svn.iss:
(Files): Installing the file missing_shfolderdll.html if
shfolder.dll is in the system folder during the installation.
(Icons) Adding the entry 'Download and install shfolder.dll' in the
start menu if shfolder.dll is in the system folder during the
installation.

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #1289 - 'svn st -u' fails if directory deleted in HEAD (w/ kfogel).
* subversion/libsvn_client/status.c
(add_update_info_to_status_hash): Check to see if the thing we are
about to run the status on exists in HEAD.  If not, save ourselves
the trouble of doing an status editor drive, and just mark the
thing as deleted from the repos.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/stat_tests.py
(test_list): No longer expect status_on_forward_deletion() to fail.
